entry.title: Guide
entry.content:
Projects Research Issues

Introduction

This website reports all the data details related to our paper : Microservice architecture open source projects empirical research.

Menu

Projects: Shows information about 101 projects that contain “Microservice” in their description and subject, including name, GitHub link, description, and commits.
Issues: We identified 3,412 issue instances. On this basis, we classified them into 10 categories: Programming issues, Optimization issues, Testability issues, Readability issues, Security issues, Robustness issues, Performance issues, Data consistency issues, Adaptability issues, and Microservice-specific issues.
